com.unvired.lib.utility

Class XMLBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.unvired.lib.utility.XMLBuilder

  • public class XMLBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    XMLBuilder is an utility class that provides a quick and easy alternative to constructing an XML Document. It can also emit the constructed Document as a string representation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLBuilder(java.lang.String rootName)
      Creates a DOM Document with rootName as the tag for the Document element.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAttribute(org.w3c.dom.Node parent, java.lang.String attrName, java.lang.String attrValue)
      Adds an attribute to the input Node with the specified name and value.
      org.w3c.dom.Node addNode(org.w3c.dom.Node parent, java.lang.String nodeName)
      Adds a child Node to the input node with nodeName as the tag.
      org.w3c.dom.Node addNodeWithValue(org.w3c.dom.Node parent, java.lang.String nodeName, java.lang.String nodeValue)
      Adds a child Node to the input node with nodeName as the tag and nodeValue as the content.
      org.w3c.dom.Node getRoot()
      Returns the document element.
      java.lang.String getXML()
      Returns the string representation of the XML Document.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
